Description: Ready to inspire, this elegant and stylish formal dress features sparkling gem crowns the high neck and the waistline. Crystal beaded webs through the illusion sweetheart bodice with keyhole and the sheer back. Side slit and floor length skirt with train adds elegant touch to the style.
